SEARCH
Package edu.baylor.GroupFive.database.services

Class ReservationServices

java.lang.Object
edu.baylor.GroupFive.database.services.ReservationServices
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dao<Reservation>, ReservationDao
public class ReservationServices extends Object implements ReservationDao
The ReservationServices class provides methods for managing reservations in the database. It implements the ReservationDao interface.
Author:
Brendon, Chase, Cole, Icko

    • get

      public Reservation get(int id) throws SQLException
      Singular find. Searches for a reservation based on their database id. Throws SQLException if an error occurs communicating with the database.
      Specified by:
      get in interface Dao<Reservation>
      Parameters:
      id - The database id of the reservation to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Reservation object corresponding to the id.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs during database communication.

      Parameters:

      startDate - The start date of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The Reservation object corresponding to the room number and start date.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs during database communication.

    • delete

      public Integer delete(Reservation reservation) throws SQLException
      "Deletes" a reservation from our database. Nothing is actually removed from the database, but the reservations active status is set to false.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface Dao<Reservation>
      Parameters:
      reservation - Reservation to cancel
      Returns:
      Number of rows affected by query
      Throws:
      SQLException - If error occurs during database communication

    • checkIfAvailable

      public Boolean checkIfAvailable(int roomNumber, Date startDate, Date endDate) throws SQLException
      Checks if a Room is available during a start and end date.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - Number of room
      startDate - Start date of interval
      endDate - End date of interval
      Returns:
      true if room is available. false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If error occurs during database communication
